name: Bobby's Adventure
description:
This is a game made in an Evolis 3D (our study center) 3 days Game Jam, where the subject was "A toy store".

The game is an Endless Runner 2D (with 3D models), where an abandoned toy in a toy store tries to survive the other toys, which try to kill him.

Team Members:

Adriana as a 3D Artist

Paula as a 3D Artist

Ingrid as a Game Programmer and Technical Artist

Xènia as a Game Programmer

Judith as a 3D Artist and UI Artist

Controls:

Move: Left and Right arrow

Jump: Space
